member.name: T:SerialPortTest.WinSerialPort
member.summary: Serial Port class of Win32 API

member.name: F:SerialPortTest.WinSerialPort.DtrControl.Disable
member.summary: Disables the DTR line when the device is opened and leaves it disabled.

member.name: F:SerialPortTest.WinSerialPort.DtrControl.Enable
member.summary: Enables the DTR line when the device is opened and leaves it on.

member.name: F:SerialPortTest.WinSerialPort.DtrControl.Handshake
member.summary: Enables DTR handshaking. If handshaking is enabled, it is an error for the application to adjust the line by using the EscapeCommFunction function.

member.name: F:SerialPortTest.WinSerialPort.RtsControl.Disable
member.summary: Disables the RTS line when the device is opened and leaves it disabled.

member.name: F:SerialPortTest.WinSerialPort.RtsControl.Enable
member.summary: Enables the RTS line when the device is opened and leaves it on.

member.name: F:SerialPortTest.WinSerialPort.RtsControl.Handshake
member.summary: Enables RTS handshaking. The driver raises the RTS line when the "type-ahead" (input) buffer is less than one-half full and lowers the RTS line when the buffer is more than three-quarters full. If handshaking is enabled, it is an error for the application to adjust the line by using the EscapeCommFunction function.

member.name: F:SerialPortTest.WinSerialPort.RtsControl.Toggle
member.summary: Specifies that the RTS line will be high if bytes are available for transmission. After all buffered bytes have been sent, the RTS line will be low.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Opens this instance.

member.summary: Closes this instance.

member.summary: Writes the specified buffer.

member.summary: Discards the in buffer.

member.summary: Discards the out buffer.
